comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Original caption is Dorothy Battie A Dorothy Battie is mentioned in The sun., February 16, 1916, Page 9, col. 3 as guest at a luncheon ("LUNCHEON FOR BRIDAL PARTY")

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of January 18, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60A13F9345F13738... has a picture of Dorothy Battie as "among this season's debutantes.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: There is an Annie Dorothy Battie, who was born on 22 June 1894 in Manhattan, New York, New York to W. H. Battie and Anna Louise Bartow. In 1914 she would have been 20 years old when she made her debut.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Battie is correct; we will fix title.
